mapper.select: SELECT account_state accountState FROM account WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND account_pw = PASSWORD(#{accountPw})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET account_state = '활성화' WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND account_pw = PASSWORD(#{accountPw})
UPDATE account SET account_state = '휴면' WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), last_login_date) >= 90 AND account_state = '활성화'
mapper.select: SELECT account_id accountId , account_level accountLevel FROM account WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND account_pw = PASSWORD(#{accountPw})
SELECT account_level accountLevel FROM account WHERE account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT s.account_id accountId , s.student_name studentName , s.student_gender studentGender , s.student_birth studentBirth , s.student_email studentEmail , s.student_phone studentPhone , s.create_date FROM student s INNER JOIN account a ON s.account_id = a.account_id WHERE s.account_id = a.account_id AND a.account_state = '대기'
